control.name: Custom Prompt Page
control.description: Custom prompt page with modular left pane, drag/drop support, and configurable script paths
control.author: KK

properties.name: BaseScriptPaths
properties.description: JSON object with absolute URLs for JS modules. Example: {"CustomPromptPage": "/path/CustomPromptPage.js", "LeftPane": "/path/LeftPane.js", "RightPane": "/path/RightPane.js", "DragDrop": "/path/DragDrop.js"}

properties.name: buttonGroups
properties.description: JSON array defining grouped buttons (labels, icons, queries, etc.) for the left pane
